p: A stock solution of LOX was prepared by dissolving around 5.7 units/mL of LOX in 0.2 M borate buffer pH 9.0 (1 unit corresponding to 1 Âµmol of hydroperoxide formed per min). Five concentrations of S. africana EO in dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) were tested as inhibitor solution for LOX inhibition activity assay: 1.5, 2.5, 5.0, 7.5 and 10.0 mg/mL.
